epic_issue_format.title: Replace Material UI components with CareUI/custom components
epic_issue_format.body:
> ‚ÑπÔ∏è **Do not assign this issue to yourself, you may assign sub-issues of this epic.**

Now that we have pretty good coverage on the custom components (ref: [üõ†Ô∏è Tailwinding Care](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/issues/3742)) we can **replace all the existing usages of Material UI components and icons with custom components and** [üè• **Care Icons**](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/4071).

Most of the below tasks consist of page-by-page migrations, hence also **consider migrating from the `PageTitle` with `Page` component** if `PageTitle` exists in the file you'll be modifying in the task. (See [example](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/4796/files#diff-8e39f154ccf13c9dedd0f968d21a0abbde450e88df9724a4e7d4264d487a7846))

### Tasks

{{tasks}}

tasks_issue_format.title: {{title}}
tasks_issue_format.body:
```tsx
{{imports}}
```

### Tasks

Ensure all the below tasks are accomplished if applicable to the file being modified in the PR.

- [ ] Migrate all Material UI components to use new Care UI / custom components. (ref: [üõ†Ô∏è Tailwinding Care](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/issues/3742))
- [ ] Migrate all Material UI icons to use [üè• **Care Icons**](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/4071).
- [ ] Migrate `PageTitle` to `Page` component if any. (See [example](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/4796/files#diff-8e39f154ccf13c9dedd0f968d21a0abbde450e88df9724a4e7d4264d487a7846))

For more information see the epic issue that tracks this issue.
